Text: MEMBERSHIP REWARDS Update for Sara Shackleton Special Offers for MEMBERSHIP REWARDS Enrollees from American Express March Spring is almost here which also means tax season With incredible bonus point opportunities spring travel rewards and more youll see how the MEMBERSHIP REWARDS program makes the busiest time of year a bit lesstaxing Pay your taxes with the Card and earn MEMBERSHIP REWARDS points How do you get great vacations electronics and gift certificates when you pay your individual federal income tax Its easy when youre enrolled in the MEMBERSHIP REWARDS program Pay your taxes with the American Express Card and youll earn points that bring you closer to the rewards you want Using the Card to pay taxes is smartand simple Prepare your individual federal tax return Form by paper or electronically Log on to sbctcgisimd or call PAYTAX Pay your taxes using the American Express Card You can also charge your taxes if you are requesting an extension of time to file Form paying federal estimated taxes Form ES or state income taxes NOTE All federal tax payments made with the American Express Card are subject to a convenience fee by Official Payments Corporation Complete information about the fee will be provided when you call or visit them online Official Payments Corporation accepts state income tax payments for the District of Columbia and the following states Alabama Arkansas California Connecticut Illinois Indiana Iowa Kansas Maryland Minnesota Mississippi New Jersey New York Ohio Oklahoma Pennsylvania Rhode Island Virginia and Wisconsin Get your finances in orderredeem points for American Express Financial Advisory Service With tax season here theres no better time to get your finances in order in An American Express financial advisor will analyze your financial picture Whether you want to prepare for a comfortable retirement save for a childs education or keep more of what you earn an American Express financial advisor has the knowledge and resources to help you make better informed decisions By redeeming MEMBERSHIP REWARDS points you will receive a certificate to be used toward the Financial Advisory Service fee To learn more about how to redeem for an American Express Financial Advisors Consultation go to sbctcgisimd Take the edge off with a night at the movies from Hollywood Movie Magic Take some down time with a night at the movies The MEMBERSHIP REWARDS program is pleased to announce our newest partner Hollywood Movie Magic When you redeem points youll get a Hollywood Movie Magic Package good for ten fullpriced admissions up to and six concessions Certificates are redeemable at participating Hollywood Movie Magic theatres in the United States the largest theatre network nationwide and are valid anytime for any movie Your Hollywood Concession MoneyTM can be used to purchase popcorn soda or any other snack of your choice Redeem points now and experience Hollywood Movie Magic To learn how to redeem MEMBERSHIP REWARDS points for the Hollywood Movie Magic Movie Package click here sbctcgisimd Visit wwwhollywoodmoviemagicnet or call to find a participating theatre near you This reward is valid through Plan a weekend getaway and earn Bonus Points at Hilton Garden Inn Hotels From now until Hilton HHonors members can earn both MEMBERSHIP REWARDS bonus points and Hilton HHonors points when they pay for weekend stays using an American Express Card at participating Hilton Garden Inn hotels To take advantage of this offer simply request MEMBERSHIP REWARDS bonus points and present your HHonors account number and eligible enrolled American Express Card number at time of reservation or check in To learn more about this offer see participating locations or enroll in Hilton HHonors click here Weekend stay includes a Friday night or Saturday night To be eligible to earn bonus points you must be enrolled in both Hilton HHonors and the MEMBERSHIP REWARDS program at time of stay and pay for your stay with an eligible enrolled American Express Card Bonus points offer includes bonus points per stay plus bonus points for weekend stays Bonus points will be credited to your MEMBERSHIP REWARDS account within weeks Bonus ID Double points makes Orlando twice as much fun in May and June Summer time is family time in Orlando Enjoy Orlandos attractions shopping dining golf or simply relax in the sunOrlando offers fun for your entire family Earn double MEMBERSHIP REWARDS points when you use the Card from at participating Orlando hotels such as Wyndham Orlando Resort Villas of Grand Cypress Hyatt Orlando select Embassy Suites and Holiday Inns and many others And youll also earn double points at great restaurants like Wolfgang Puck Grand Cafe plus retailers attractions and more For a complete list of participants where you can earn Double Points go to Offer valid Bonus ID Get two free weekend nights earn Silver Elite status with Marriott Rewards TAKE TWO offer Its always a great idea to use your eligible enrolled American Express Card at hotels so youll earn MEMBERSHIP REWARDS points on your stay If youre enrolled in the Marriott Rewards program your stay will be even more rewarding with Marriott Rewards Take Two offer Marriott Rewards enrollees can earn two free weekend nights plus Silver elite status in Marriott Rewards when you make three paid stays at any of more than Marriott hotels from through To learn more or to enroll in Marriott Rewards click here sbctcgisimd Terms and conditions apply You must be a Marriott Rewards member to take advantage of this offer and registration is required for participation in this promotion Visit sbctcgisimd Last chance to Earn a Continental OnePass Bonus on your MEMBERSHIP REWARDS Point Transfer Weve extended the deadline until You still have time to earn a mileage bonus when you transfer MEMBERSHIP REWARDS points to your OnePass account Its simple every time you transfer a minimum of points now through youll earn a OnePass mileage bonus Just be sure to register for the promotion before you transfer MEMBERSHIP REWARDS points To register call and mention promotion code GG ONE AXM Dont miss out on this easy way to earn miles towards free travel To transfer MEMBERSHIP REWARDS points to a Onepass account click here sbctcgisimd Bonus Point eligibility To be eligible to earn bonus points you must be enrolled in the MEMBERSHIP REWARDS program at the time of purchase and charge your purchase to an eligible enrolled American Express Card Bonus points will be credited to your MEMBERSHIP REWARDS account within weeks To learn more ways you can earn bonus points on purchases click here sbctcgisimd If you were sent this email in error or you wish to unsubscribe to this newsletter please use this address in your communication to us If you do not want to receive this monthly publication please click the reply button and type the word remove in the subject line of your response This option will not affect any preferences you may have previously expressed with respect to other American Express emails Please visit the American Express Privacy Statement at sbctcgisimd to set review or change preferences regarding the type of email offers you want to receive American Express
